name: RIB office Database File
summary: Learn about .ROD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ROD files can contain information such as time management data, drawings, employee information, contacts, contract data, and invoices.
NOTE: RIB office is no longer available.

description: Database file used by RIB office, a project management application for planners and engineers in building construction, civil engineering, and road construction; stores all office data in the Progress ObjectStore database format; used as the backend format for saving RIB office data.
